short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paint & draw in your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Tab Painter" extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use https://oezmarketing.com/Terms/ and privacy policy https://oezmarketing.com/Privacy-Policy/
